alert.note: Alert for Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 9:49PM CDT until April 04 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wyandotte County in northeastern Kansas... Leavenworth County in northeastern Kansas... South central Platte County in west central Missouri... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 949 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tonganoxie, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Leavenworth, Lansing, Bonner Springs, Parkville, Tonganoxie, Basehor, Edwardsville, Kansas City, Reno, Fairmount, Farley, Fort Leavenworth, Wolcott, Pomeroy, Waldron, Stillings, Beverly, Beverly Hills, Maywood and East Leavenworth. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 410 and 412. Interstate 435 between mile markers 13 and 30. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 206 and 226. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
